alert.note: Alert for Mayes; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 1:19PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Delaware, southeastern Mayes, northern Adair, east central Wagoner and northern Cherokee Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 119 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Tahlequah, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Tahlequah... Westville... Locust Grove... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Hulbert... Watts... Oaks... Eldon... Proctor... Christie... Peggs... Rose... Leach... Scraper... Twin Oaks... Sequoyah State Park... Ballard... Lost City... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
